recipe.title: Peaches with Serrano Ham and Basil
instructions: Toss together peaches, sugar, vinegar, and cumin and let stand 10 minutes. Cut ham slices in half lengthwise, then wrap each piece around a wedge of peach. Top with a basil leaf and secure with a wooden or metal pick.
